entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:40 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: SSW 37 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
